subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, June 18 (AP) — Kenny Rogers won his 200th game. Detroit set a club record with eight home runs. And Mark Prior had one of the worst outings of his career.
snippet: CHICAGO, June 18 (AP) — Kenny Rogers won his 200th game. Detroit set a club record with eight home runs. And Mark Prior had one of the worst outings of his career.
